name: Adventure of Cletus (Crazymadperson)
description:
Adventure of Cletus, is a small fighting game, where you can choose which character to be and go head to head against your friends. The objective of this game is to shoot and knock off the other characters until their lives hit zero. The last man standing wins.

To play this game; download the file given, extract everything within it, and run the .exe. 

The game is not perfect, as there are still some problems within the game and some bugs. But thank you anyways for downloading and playing this game. 

Note: This is just a project for a class. So everything is done by novice college students.

Please have fun playing Adventure of Cletus.

Credits:

Designers: Gabriel Rios and Kaylyn Harbison

Artist: Marvin Ramirez

Programmer: Caleb White
